title: Keir Starmer – 2020 Response to the Prime Minister’s Statement
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Keir Starmer, the Leader of the Opposition, on 10 May 2020.
content:
[This statement](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/boris-johnson-2020-statement-on-the-coronavirus-10-05-2020/) raises more questions than it answers, and we see the prospect of England, Scotland, Wales and Northern Ireland pulling in different directions.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[EIF]: education inspection framework
  *[
  JTAIs
 ]: joint targeted area inspections
  *[JTAIs]: joint targeted area inspections
  *[
  ILACS
 ]: inspections of local authority children's services
  *[ILACS]: inspections of local authority children's services
  *[
  SEND
 ]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
  *[SEND]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
  *[EEF]: the Education Endowment Foundation
  *[DfE]: Department for education
  *[
  EIF
 ]: education inspection framework

The Prime Minister appears to be effectively telling millions of people to go back to work without a clear plan for safety or clear guidance as to how to get there without using public transport.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[EIF]: education inspection framework
  *[
  JTAIs
 ]: joint targeted area inspections
  *[JTAIs]: joint targeted area inspections
  *[
  ILACS
 ]: inspections of local authority children's services
  *[ILACS]: inspections of local authority children's services
  *[
  SEND
 ]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
  *[SEND]: special educational needs and/or disabilities
  *[EEF]: the Education Endowment Foundation
  *[DfE]: Department for education
  *[
  EIF
 ]: education inspection framework

What the country wanted tonight was clarity and consensus, but we haven’t got either of those.
